comments.body: We'll update this as part of the post-release process.
Can you make each of these titles hyperlinks to the right section?

> Can you make each of these titles hyperlinks to the right section?

I can, but the problem is that I can only do this with hardcoded html links (so not with a sphinx label that will always work, even if we rename a page that it is referencing). 

That's the reason I mixed some sphinx rst in between the raw html for the buttons, to still get the link through sphinx.  
Now, for those 4 main links, that's maybe not a big problem.

(I think ideally, we would write a custom sphinx directive for those blocks, so we can write in normal text and let the directive generate the hmtl, instead of using raw html here, but that would require some more work)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@
Getting started

New to pandas? Check out the getting started guides. They contain an introduction to pandas' main concepts and links to additional tutorials.
